update public.t_erp_whouse_check_detail set check_id = #{checkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sku = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inventory_count = #{inventoryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, space_id = #{spaceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, price = #{price,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, state = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{detailId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where detail_id = #{detailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select t.detail_id, t.check_id, t.sku, t.count, t.inventory_count, t.space_id, t.price, t.state, t.enterprise_id, goods.storget_image,goods.name,spa.space_code, t.create_user_id, t.create_user_name, t.create_date, t.modify_user_id, t.modify_user_name, t.type, t.modify_date, t.last_modify_date from public.t_erp_whouse_check_detail t left join public.t_erp_goods goods on t.sku = goods.sku left join public.t_erp_space spa on t.space_id = spa.space_id where t.state = 1 and goods.state = 1 and t.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and goods.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and t.check_id = #{search.check_id,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by t.last_modify_date desc
